title: Ziggs in the botlane
body:
So currently I main Ziggs because he's incredibly fun to play and does everything I want my champions to do. When I queue I go for mid/bot and people always think I'm trolling with the Ziggs bot pick. Does anyone else do this? Is it so terrible? I do fairly well with him anywhere I play him and in my opinion he brings enough the table that an adc is not inherently necessary. 

Thoughts/Opinions?

replies.body: I think ziggs would work amazingly well not and synergies with all kinds of supports (poke /all in) and sounds like he would round up a teamcomp with a yasuo zed talon mid very well. I am almost compelled to try it; it's just that I play him so differently mid (constant shove and then either poke under turret or roam and shove wave while I'm gone with ult ) that I might have to play him differently bot idk.

i play sion mid with all kinds of varying builds

people ask me

sion mid?
really?

and it works fantastic 95% of the time
Yea i know just 95% because even i have bad days 

anyway if it works it works

I dont think ziggs bot is bad 

try malzahar morgana bot, its pure cancer
Heimer alistar with double zzrot and banner is pure cancer too

some stuff just works go for it

besides adc can be played elsewhere too
his tower pushing is second to none and he trades extremely well with tankier supports bot lane
Think for a second. The meta exists for a reason.

think outside of the box for a second

and realise meta isnt mandatory

Meta by definition is what is considered optimal at that time.

It is mandatory if the other team aren't retards.

If you are a diamond player playing in silver you can pull an ap jhin just because the enemy is stupid enough to don't know how to farm, group or trade.

For me at least only in bronze I can make stupid shit like jarvan support or soraka mid work.
I remember back when I started playing League mid-s4, Ziggs supp was fairly common. He has poke, a slow, & decent peel. Never seen him played as an apc in the botlane tho.

You are objectively wrong. ADCs are necessary because their high sustained damage is necessary to take objectives quickly and kill front liners, especially tanks. Ziggs is good at taking towers and his objective control is good, but he doesn't have the other things you want from a traditional ADC.

maybe, but I feel that ziggs DOES have exceptional sustained damage, although I will agree he does struggle with tanks.

> [{quoted}](name=Kidro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YETo9urN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-14T23:56:44.286+0000)
>
> maybe, but I feel that ziggs DOES have exceptional sustained damage, although I will agree he does struggle with tanks.

If he struggles with tanks he doesn't have exceptional sustained damage.

Furthermore, the thing about mages bot isn't that they can't lane versus ADCs. They can lane against them just fine. But the problem is with how they scale relative to ADCs.

Mages are much more level-reliant than an ADC is. Being forced to share exp with your support means that, even if you are technically even with the enemy adc, they will be more valuable because they aren't as reliant on scaling with their levels. Ziggs wants to level up so the base damage on his abilities and their cooldowns get better. By going bottom lane he is going to be struggling more than the Jinx or Twitch who can scale based off of their baller as fuck auto attacks, rather than abilities.

And, as people said, your team frankly needs an ADC-equivalent. Kindred jungle might work as a fine replacement, but if you don't have one you're going to struggle as the game goes on.
granted I'm only low silver so this has a lot to do with that but carry's arnt going to build MR to counter his dmg and ziggs can 3 shot turrets after midgame
It's only viable if you have something like GP top and Zed mid or an AD JG.
